TopicTitle: I can't set a custom user title!

Articles.Content: Help? It just doesn't show up.
Hmm... I can't think of much but a few common solutions. Is the "reset" box unchecked? You do press "save changes," correct? I haven't ever had a problem with it.
Go to settings -- edit profile and it should be the first box under the "optional information" heading.
There was another user that had the same issue, I'll ping one of the admins about it.

> 
> There was another user that had the same issue, I'll ping one of the admins about it.

\*grumpf\* & +1

Finnally xDr ; ) moddable stock part of kerbalkind again.
